How to render a Rails 3 view in a rake task

Recently I needed to render a Haml view into HTML from a rake task. Information on how to do that is kind of sparse for Rails 3.

Googling turned out a few posts with slightly different variations on the solution, but most of them either a bit bloated, not working or using deprecated apis. You can read up on them: here , here, here, and here
